home.title: THE BEST EXPERIENCE
home.subtitle: FOR OUR PARTNERS
home.description: Accompanying us, you have a trip full of experiences. With Chisfis, booking accommodation, resort villas, hotels

about.title: About the club
about.description:
The last thing you should feel on vacation is limited. We
                  designed Exotic Travelers to put you in charge. Pick from our
                  exclusive portfolio of resorts and villas in the most coveted
                  destinations. Your membership ensures luxury stays and entire
                  treatment. Whether for three days or a week, your getaway is
                  on your terms. Enjoy members-only advantages like discounts,
                  plus vacation exchanges. Your possibilities are boundless.

members.title: Members levels
members.description:
Our membership tiers offer unparalleled amenities, surpassing
                  regular all-inclusive offerings. Elevate your experience with
                  our VIP Concierge Service, aiding in vacation planning, resort
                  booking, and exchanges through esteemed travel networks. Our
                  continuous efforts find optimal airfare rates and unique
                  excursions. With Exotic Travelers, a single call can transport
                  you globally.

aboutItems.description1:
Stay in a Royal Suite or any other Presidential category in our present and future hotels and receive up to 50% off published rack rates, guaranteed!.
   </br>  Check in the day you wish, stay as long as you like and use as many rooms as you require.
aboutItems.description2:
Imagine a world where you can experience the privilege of global travel like never before, all while reveling in the lap of luxury and the finest services.
    </br></br> This isn’t just a vacation; it’s an exclusive adventure you can enjoy with your friends and family, forging memories that will last a lifetime.
aboutItems.description3:
Exotic Travelers is an elite travel club that offers you the keys to a world of unforgettable experiences. Becoming a member will unlock a treasure trove of benefits, from personalized trip planning to cost savings and exceptional service.
     </br></br> Let us take care of the logistics while you focus on what truly matters: exploring the world, one extraordinary journey at a time.
aboutItems.description4:
Your butler is dedicated to providing unparalleled service, catering to your every need and desire.
    </br></br> Whether mixing up your preferred beverage with the utmost precision or orchestrating a flawless in-suite dining experience carefully curated by one of our esteemed Executive Chefs, your butler is here to ensure that your stay at the hotel is nothing short of exceptional.
    </br>With a keen attention to detail and a commitment to excellence, they are your concierge, ready to make your stay memorable.
aboutItems.description5:
Your butler is dedicated to providing unparalleled service, catering to your every need and desire.
    </br></br> Whether mixing up your preferred beverage with the utmost precision or orchestrating a flawless in-suite dining experience carefully curated by one of our esteemed Executive Chefs, your butler is here to ensure that your stay at the hotel is nothing short of exceptional.
    </br>With a keen attention to detail and a commitment to excellence, they are your concierge, ready to make your stay memorable.

benefits.title: MEMBERS BENEFITS
benefits.subtitle: FOR OUR PARTNERS
benefits.description: Enjoy the privilege of travel around the world and destinations with comfort, luxury & services that can be extended to your friends and family.

listBenefits.description1: Private round trip airport transfer (minimum stay of 7 nights)
listBenefits.description2: Private limousine round trip airport transfer (minimum stay of 4 nights)
listBenefits.description5: Cold bottle of champagne waiting in your room upon arrival
listBenefits.description6: Cold bottle of sparkling wine waiting in your room upon arrival
listBenefits.description9: In- suite welcome amenity upon arrival
listBenefits.description16: Candlelight dinner for two (2) on the beach (minimum stay of 7 nights)
listBenefits.description17: Candlelight dinner for two (2) on the beach (minimum stay of 4 nights)
listBenefits.description18: In-suite thematic prepared by the chef (minimum stay of 4 nights)
listBenefits.description22: Full access to all members-only events***
listBenefits.description23: Snorkeling gear available upon request with your butler
listBenefits.description25: Late check-out free of charge (subject to availability)
listBenefits.description28: Up to 20% OFF (gift shop/ Spa / Hotel services)
listBenefits.description29: 1 (One) relaxing back massage (25 minutes) per adult (minimum stay of 4 nights)
listBenefits.description30: 2 (Two) back relaxing massages (50 mins) per adult (minimum stay of 4 nights)
listBenefits.description31: 2 (Two) in- house tours per guest (minimum stay of 4 nights)
listBenefits.description32: 1 (One) manicure per adult at resort spa (minimum stay of 7 nights)
listBenefits.description33: 1 (One) pedicure per adult at resort spa (minimum stay of 7 nights)
listBenefits.description34: 1 (One) signature spa treatment (120 mins) (minimum stay of 7 nights)
listBenefits.description35: Laundry service (10 items per person, per stay)
listBenefits.description38: Welcome upon arrival by general manager and butler with private in-suite check-in (if ready on arrival)
